name: Daily Exploration
description: discover new locations for the Explorers' Guild.
Map unknown areas and report your findings
to expand our knowledge of the world.

objectives.create_map: Create a Map of Your Discoveries

dialogs.start2: There are still many unmapped areas in our region.
dialogs.start3: Your discoveries help keep our maps up to date.
dialogs.progress2: Your exploration skills are quite impressive.
dialogs.complete1: Excellent work! These maps will be invaluable.
dialogs.complete2: Thanks to explorers like you, our world grows less mysterious each day.
